is Mother’s Day, Swarovski joins forces with Hia Magazine to celebrate the beauty of motherhood through an exclusive collaboration featuring Rym Saidi and her beautiful daughters, Bella, and Sophia.

Capturing the essence of love, elegance, and connection, this campaign highlights the magic of gifting and the timeless bond between mother and child.
Get free same-day delivery. Shop now and receive your order the same day:

Order before 6 PM for delivery in Dubai.
Order before 12 PM for delivery in Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, and Ajman.

Valid exclusively during the month of Ramadan.
*Terms and conditions apply.

Adorned in iconic pieces from the Idyllia, Chroma, Sublima, and Millenia families, Rym and her daughters embody the radiant spirit of Swarovski—where brilliance meets emotion in every piece.

Discover the perfect gift to honor the extraordinary women in your life.
Find the perfect gift <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/hbp_C8BRLCYmJpmC2iXUyVy2m?domain=click.noreply.swarovski.com>
